content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motion Exercises are great for mental health. Your brain will be very happy if you do. Most research shows that motion exercises can strengthen mental health, reduce symptoms of anxiety, depression, and eliminate dorsolumbar disorders for spending to much time in front of the computer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Make sure you get enough motion!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":264267,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/444af9cf-549d-4fad-9585-676a3aa262b4/Picture29.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/444af9cf-549d-4fad-9585-676a3aa262b4/Picture29.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture29.png\",\"name\":\"Picture29.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"444af9cf-549d-4fad-9585-676a3aa262b4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":686,\"height\":467},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
